verses.verse: Now <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> together with the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> women of the <S%H4125>Moabites,<s%> <S%H5984>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H130>Edomites,<s%> <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> and <S%H2850>Hittites;<s%>

of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> concerning which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "You shall not go <S%H935>among<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> neither shall they come among <S%H403>you;<s%> for surely they will turn <S%H5186>away<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods.<s%>" <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1692>joined<s%> to these in <S%H157>love.<s%>

He had <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H8282>princesses,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6370>concubines;<s%> and his <S%H802>wives<s%> turned <S%H5186>away<s%> his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

For it <S%H6256>happened,<s%> when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> was <S%H2209>old,<s%> that his <S%H802>wives<s%> turned <S%H5186>away<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods;<s%> and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> was not <S%H8003>perfect<s%> with <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> as was the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

For <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H6253>Ashtoreth<s%> the <S%H430>goddess<s%> of the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4445>Milcom<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H5984>Ammonites.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H4390>didn't<s%> go fully <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as did <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> a high <S%H1116>place<s%> for <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and for <S%H4432>Molech<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>
So he <S%H6213>did<s%> for all his <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> who burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> because his <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H5186>turned<s%> away from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who had <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him <S%H6471>twice,<s%>

and had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him concerning this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> that he should not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> but he <S%H8104>didn't<s%> keep that which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> "Because this is done by <S%H8104>you,<s%> and you have not kept my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> which I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H7167>you,<s%> I will surely <S%H7167>tear<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> from <S%H5414>you,<s%> and will give it to your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

Notwithstanding I will not <S%H6213>do<s%> it in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> for <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H7167>sake;<s%> but I will tear it out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of your <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H7535>However<s%> I will not tear <S%H7167>away<s%> all the <S%H4467>kingdom;<s%> but I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> to your <S%H1121>son,<s%> for <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H3389>sake,<s%> and for Jerusalem's sake which I have <S%H977>chosen.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> raised <S%H6965>up<s%> an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite:<s%> he was of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2233>seed<s%> in <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

For it <S%H1732>happened,<s%> when David was in <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> and had <S%H2491>struck<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%>
(for <S%H3097>Joab<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> there <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months,<s%> until he had cut <S%H3772>off<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%>);

that <S%H111>Hadad<s%> <S%H1272>fled,<s%> he and <S%H582>certain<s%> <S%H130>Edomites<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> with <S%H935>him,<s%> to go into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> being yet a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>child.<s%>

They <S%H6965>arose<s%> out of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6290>Paran;<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with them out of <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> who <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>appointed<s%> him <S%H3899>food,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> so that he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him as <S%H802>wife<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of his own <S%H802>wife,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H8472>Tahpenes<s%> the <S%H1377>queen.<s%>

The <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H8472>Tahpenes<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H1592>Genubath<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> whom <S%H8472>Tahpenes<s%> <S%H1580>weaned<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H1592>Genubath<s%> was in <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

When <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and that <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "Let me <S%H7971>depart,<s%> that I may <S%H3212>go<s%> to my own <S%H776>country.<s%>"

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2638>him,<s%> "But what have you lacked with <S%H1245>me,<s%> that behold, you seek to <S%H3212>go<s%> to your own <S%H776>country?<s%>" He <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H7971>"Nothing,<s%> however only let me <S%H7971>depart.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> raised <S%H6965>up<s%> an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> to <S%H7331>him,<s%> Rezon the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H450>Eliada,<s%> who had <S%H1272>fled<s%> from his <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah.<s%>

He <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H8269>him,<s%> and became captain over a <S%H1416>troop,<s%> when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> them of <S%H3212>Zobah:<s%> and they went to <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H4427>therein,<s%> and reigned in <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

He was an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> besides the <S%H7451>mischief<s%> of <S%H1908>Hadad:<s%> and he <S%H6973>abhorred<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H758>Syria.<s%>

<S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> an <S%H673>Ephraimite<s%> of <S%H6868>Zeredah,<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> whose <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6871>Zeruah,<s%> <S%H802>a<s%> <S%H490>widow,<s%> he also lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

This was the <S%H1697>reason<s%> why he lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H4428>king:<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> and <S%H5462>repaired<s%> the breach of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> was a mighty <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valor;<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that he was <S%H6213>industrious,<s%> and he put him in <S%H6485>charge<s%> of all the <S%H5447>labor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

It happened at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> when <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H7888>Shilonite<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> him in the <S%H1870>way;<s%> now Ahijah had <S%H3680>clad<s%> himself with a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8008>garment;<s%> and they <S%H8147>two<s%> were alone in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H281>Ahijah<s%> laid <S%H8610>hold<s%> of the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8008>garment<s%> that was on <S%H7167>him,<s%> and tore it in <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7168>pieces.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H7168>pieces;<s%> for thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7167><s%> 'Behold, I will tear the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> tribes to <S%H7626>you<s%>

(but he shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe,<s%> for my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s sake and for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>'s <S%H5892>sake,<s%> the city which I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>);

because that they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H7812>me,<s%> and have worshiped <S%H6253>Ashtoreth<s%> the <S%H430>goddess<s%> of the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H4445>Milcom<s%> the <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%> They have not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and to keep my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> as <S%H1732>David<s%> his father <S%H1>did.<s%>

<S%H3947><s%>"'However I will not take the whole <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but I will <S%H7896>make<s%> him <S%H5387>prince<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life,<s%> for <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s sake whom I <S%H977>chose,<s%> who <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes;<s%>
but I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> out of his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H6235>you,<s%> even ten <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

To his <S%H1121>son<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> may have a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> <S%H3117>always<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> which I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> me to <S%H7760>put<s%> my name <S%H8034>there.<s%>
I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4427>you,<s%> and you shall reign according to all that your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desires,<s%> and shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It shall <S%H8085>be,<s%> if you will listen to all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H1980>you,<s%> and will walk in my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> as <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6213>did;<s%> that I will be with <S%H1129>you,<s%> and will build you a <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> as I <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H1732>David,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> Israel to <S%H3478>you.<s%>
I will for this <S%H6031>afflict<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> but not <S%H3117>forever.<s%>'"

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> therefore to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam;<s%> but <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1272>fled<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H7895>Shishak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and was in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> until the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and all that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon?<s%>
The <S%H3117>time<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
